Name: Shuniku Berries
Description: Disgusting tasting berries that will stain your mouth red.

Name: Wood Carving Knife
Description: A specially designed knife for carving wood.

Name: Rock Tumbler
Description: A round box full of hard rocks. You can smooth gemstones down with it.

name: Feather
description: Soft, fluffy, and useful for making arrows with.
gatherString: You separate the feathers into a pile.

name: Chicken Egg
description: A small egg from a chicken.

name: Chicken Meat
description: The meat of a chicken.

name: Rooster Plumage
description: A bunch of feathers from a male chicken.

name: Cheese
description: Some stinky cheese.
gatherString: You pick up some old cheese.

name: Bone Shard
description: A shard of bone dropped by a gashadokuro. You could form this into some kind of weapon.

name: Treasure Map
description: A map leading to an island north of Quepland. Mound gave it to you.

name: Hemp
description: A fast-growing weed useful for turning into fiber.

name: Leatherworking Toolkit
description: A set of tools to work leather into form.

name: Mercurial Shard
description: A smooth shard from the corpse of a mercurial being. With enough of them you could fashion some kind of weapon...

name: Mercurial Hilt
description: The hilt of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the blade and pommel to be made into a sword.

name: Mercurial Pommel
description: The pommel of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the blade and hilt to be made into a sword.

name: Mercurial Blade
description: The blade of a mercurial weapon. It'll need the hilt and pommel to be made into a sword.

name: Koncave City Passport
description: A passport into the underground city of Koncave.

Name: Camel
Description: A dromedary exceptionally capable of desert travel.

Name: River Raft
Description: It's a shame you can't swim, or you wouldn't have needed to waste money on this.

Name: Gym Membership Card
Description: This card will let you into the gym in Kogoe.

Name: Bandit's Blade
Description: The sharp part of a sword. You could probably reattach it to a hilt and make a working weapon with it.

name: Cactus Spines
description: Pokey spines from a cactus.

name: Cactus Club (Empty)
description: A club made from a special living cactus. If you covered it in spines, it would really do some damage.

name: Sand
description: It's tiny little rocks, basically.

name: Sandstone
description: Is it stone? Is it sand?

name: Honey
description: Sweet, sweet honey.

name: Baobhan Hair
description: Hair from the head of a baobhan. It's quite valuable.

name: Baobhan Tooth
description: A tooth from the mouth of a baobhan. It's magical.

name: Baobhan Jaw
description: A jaw from the mouth of a baobhan. It's got teeth in it.

name: Great Tree Seed
description: A seed from the Great Tree. It's a prized possesion among the citizens of Koncave.

name: Steelflame Axe Handle
description: A handle to a powerful flaming axe. It's missing a head.

name: Steelflame Axe Head
description: A head to a powerful flaming axe. It's missing a handle.

name: Shrinking Cloth
description: A magical cloth once owned by the guardian Imaynimayn. It could be used to make a giant's weapon the right size for you to wield.

name: Dojo Tokens
description: Tokens rewarded for defeating everyone at a dojo.
